attributes.action: Reduce Mps pay to the national average with a cap on exspences
attributes.background:
The pay structure for most Mps currently puts them in the top 5% of wage earners in the UK, way above the salaries  paid to our emergency services and armed forces who face danger everyday. 
This situation needs to be addressed in the name of fairplay

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The  Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and the Government. You can find out how to contact IPSA here http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
